about_the_game:
Environment


Red Canyon map is an exciting new DLC that brings an immersive and thrilling experience to pilots of all levels. Set in a stunning canyon environment, this map offers a unique mix of challenging terrain and breathtaking views. Players must navigate their FPV drone through narrow canyons, steep cliffs, and challenging terrain while using their skills and reflexes to dodge obstacles and avoid crashes. With realistic physics, the Canyon Map offers a highly realistic and immersive gameplay experience.

The map also includes hidden areas and secret passages that add to the excitement and unpredictability of the game. Whether you're a experienced pilot or a novice just getting started, Canyon provides endless opportunities to test your limits and hone your skills.

With its stunning visuals, challenging obstacles, and realistic physics, Canyon Map is a must-have for any FPV drone enthusiast. So gear up and take to the skies today!

Challenges




The DLC also features an exclusive challenge series called Wild West, offering two challenges for regular drones and two challenges for micro drones. The Wild West challenge series includes unique collectibles that embody the spirit of the Old West, from revolvers to cowboy hats. Each challenge offers exciting opportunities for players to explore and collect these themed items while mastering their drone skills. Whether you're flying a regular or micro drone, these challenges provide a fun and immersive experience in a Red Canyon setting.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.12
  • Processor: 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2x2048MB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.12
  • Processor: 3.8Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: FPV SkyDive - Red Canyon

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit low end devices.
